properties.name: front.security.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable Spring Security for the frontend API.

properties.name: front.security.cors-allowed-hosts
properties.description: Comma-separated list of origins allowed for CORS requests.

properties.name: front.security.jwt-secret
properties.description: Secret key used to sign JWT tokens.

properties.name: front.security.shared-token
properties.description: Shared secret expected in the X-Shared-Token header for authenticated requests.

properties.name: front.cache.path
properties.description: Path used to store cached files.

properties.name: front.rate-limit.anonymous
properties.description: Maximum requests per minute for anonymous users.

properties.name: front.rate-limit.authenticated
properties.description: Maximum requests per minute for authenticated users.
